Class WatchDog

  • java.lang.Object
    • ptolemy.util.test.WatchDog

    Use ptolemy.util.test.WatchDog instead. This class is outside the ptolemy hierarchy.

    @Deprecated
public class WatchDog
extends ptolemy.util.test.WatchDog
